description: Antrim keep their Division 4 Football League promotion hopes alive as they earn a comprehensive win over Leitrim.
title: Football League Division Four: Leitrim 1-13 1-18 Antrim
title_page: Football League Division Four: Leitrim 1-13 1-18 Antrim - BBC Sport
maintext:
Antrim kept their Division 4 Football League promotion hopes alive as they earned a comprehensive win over Leitrim at Carrick-on-Shannon.
The goals came early as Alan McLoughlin's fifth-minute Leitrim strike was immediately followed by Michael Pollock's Antrim three-pointer.
As Antrim took control, five CJ McGourty points helped them lead 1-12 to 1-5 at half-time.
McGourty extended his haul to eight as Antrim remained in control thereafter.
